lead_paragraph: The European Commission said Tuesday that it had begun an "in-depth" investigation into Unilever's planned $1.5 billion acquisition of the body and laundry care units of Sara Lee.
snippet: The European Commission said Tuesday that it had begun an "in-depth" investigation into Unilever's planned $1.5 billion acquisition of the body and laundry care units of Sara Lee.

headline.main: E.U. to Investigate Unilever Plans for Sara Lee Units

abstract: The European Commission said Tuesday that it had begun an "in-depth" investigation into Unilever's planned $1.5 billion acquisition of the body and laundry care units of Sara Lee.
